entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts and is mentioned as being present in the hospital wing. She is yelling at Harry for bringing something inside the castle.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and is mentioned as coming into the hospital wing. He is looking for information about what has happened.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a minister who comes into the hospital wing with Professor McGonagall and Snape. He is demanding to know where Dumbledore is.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is mentioned as being present in the hospital wing with Fudge and Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is a person who is being guarded by Professor McGonagall. Dumbledore mentions that there is no need to stand guard over him anymore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is lying in bed in the hospital wing. He hears the door open and sees people coming in.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions that he asked Professor McGonagall to stand guard over Barty Crouch.
Professor McGonagall is being scolded by Dumbledore for not following his instructions and standing guard over Barty Crouch.
